reasons.title: Owning a ring light and too many opinions
reasons.description: Your seventh hot take of the morning tripped every alarm in the algorithm.

reasons.title: Main character energy set to 110%
reasons.description: You tried to soliloquy through a group project stand-up.

reasons.title: Ghosted every email for 42 days
reasons.description: We sent smoke signals, you replied with ellipses.

reasons.title: Group chat voted you out
reasons.description: Your meme-to-message ratio exceeded community guidelines.
